<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.34</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.sn_hr_core" name="Human Resources Scoped App: Core" state="published" version="1.0.34" provider_name="ServiceNow" type="application" help="CSHelp:Human_Resources_Service_Management" licensable="true" license_model="capacity" scope_name="sn_hr_core" scope_sys_id="d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2">
<description> WARNING: Be sure that you do not have plugin Human Resources Application: Core activated. This plugin is a new HR application that duplicates some functionality in Human Resources Application: Core. If you have any questions about this plugin, contact your ServiceNow account manager. Provides case and change management for HR. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details. </description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.country"/> <import plugin="com.glide.db_images" /> <import plugin="com.snc.appview"/> <import plugin="com.snc.document_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.knowledge3"/> <import plugin="com.snc.pdf_generator"/> <import plugin="com.snc.sc_catalog_manager"/> <import plugin="com.snc.signaturepad"/> <import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.task_activity" /> <import plugin="com.snc.matching_rule"/> <import plugin="com.snc.hr.scoped_security"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>WARNING: Be sure that you do not have plugin Human Resources Application: Core activated. This plugin is a new HR application that duplicates some functionality in Human Resources Application: Core. If you have any questions about this plugin, contact your ServiceNow account manager. Provides case and change management for HR. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Human_Resources_Service_Management</help> <id>com.sn_hr_core</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Human Resources Scoped App: Core</name> <path>plugin://com.sn_hr_core/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.country,com.glide.db_images,com.snc.appview,com.snc.document_management,com.snc.knowledge3,com.snc.pdf_generator,com.snc.sc_catalog_manager,com.snc.signaturepad,com.snc.skills_management,com.snc.task_activity,com.snc.matching_rule,com.snc.hr.scoped_security</requires> <scope>sn_hr_core</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.sn_hr_core</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.34</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
